Articles.Content:
I'm new, totally, to the game and the forum. A friend recommended this game several times, but it was the past week when hi finally got me inducted.. and now me and my 7 years old kid are impressed and very interested in having more and more fun with it, not only because of the game, but the community around it. Chapeu!!!

I'm not a fanatic gamer, just play casually, but in this case I'll do an exception. As a developer, and having a kid playing the game, I assume I will bump some old 'training' threads eventually.. I have a plan on that!

Cheers!

PS: I think I don't have more youtube videos left, time to read the whole forum LOL
Hello ilo and welcome to the forum.

Hello and welcome to the forum,

it seems that we have a good number of people on here from the wonderful land of oz
